document_data.name: True dragons
document_data.mainbody:
This category is for creatures of the [[dragon]] type that grow more powerful as they age. Such creatures are described on p. 4 of ''[[Draconomicon: The Book of Dragons]]'' and listed on p. 287.
[[Category:Dragons]]
